name: ipe-compiler
description: The compiler for Ipe, a strict functional programming language for backend development

scripts.test-all: echo "Checking formatting" && elm-format --validate && echo "Checking elm-coverage and elm-test" && elm-coverage && echo "Checking elm-review" && elm-review && echo "Checking doc examples" && elm-verify-examples --run-tests && echo "Building docs..." && yarn build:docs && echo "All good!"

author: Henrique da Cunha Buss
